Maria Olsen (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abuọ N'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1966) bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa nke a maara maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri égwù
Ndị a gụnyere Paranormal Activity 3, The Lords of Salem, Gore Orphanage, na Starry Eyes.  Ọrụ ndị na-abụghị nke ihe nkiri egwu gụnyere Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
A mụrụ Olsen N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 1966, na East London, Eastern Cape, South Africa.

Olsen apụtala n'ihe karịrị ọrụ otu narị kemgbe afọ 2005.  Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị a bụ ọrụ nkwado, nke ọ na-ekwu na ọ na-enye ya ohere ịrụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ọrụ karịa ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-elekwasị anya na ọrụ ndị isi.  Ọ na-ekwu na ọrụ kachasị masị ya bụ na African Gothic, Percy Jackson, Die-ner (Get It?), The Haunting of Whaley House, na Live-In Fear, nke bụ ihe nkiri mbụ ọ mepụtara.
N'afọ 2011, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri bu MOnsterworks66.
N'afọ 2018, Olsen pụtara na, "The Exorcist: Forbidden Screening," ihe nkiri 4D na Warner Bros
"Horror made Here: A festival of frights
"  Ihe nkiri ndọrọ mmasị ahụ mere n'ime Midwest St
Church na Warner Brothers backlot, Olsen rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta ihe na-adọta egwu, site na ihe nkiri 1973, The Exorcist
Olsen bịara America n'onwa Jenụwarị 2005.  Ihe omume ọkà hụ n'anya gụnyere ịgụ na ịkpa ákwà.  Ọ bụ onye na-edina nwanyị.
